duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct Classroom Assessment Scoring System (CLASS) observations in Infant, Toddler, and Pre-Kindergarten classrooms across the State of Virginia.
Keep CLASS certification current and complete ongoing calibration as directed by project leadership.
Participate in project-specific training throughout the duration of the project and attend mandatory project information sessions.
Complete data entry and other post-observation work as defined by project leadership in a timely manner.
Maintain fidelity and adhere strictly to all CLASS observation and project-specific protocols at all stages of the project.
Interact with school administration, office staff, and teachers in a professional and courteous manner.
Use online communication and invoicing tools such as Slack, and Bill.com.

education_certification.credential: B.A. degree in relevant field, Child development or Education preferred
